SELECT r.custcom_id, c.custcom_name, r.trns_dt, r.sale_ctnt, r.sale_amt, r.borw_amt, r.prinsum_baln, r.rcipt_appo_amt AS rciptAppoAmt, r.rcipt_appo_dt AS rciptAppoDt, r.ltst_rcipt_dt AS ltstRciptDt FROM tb_rcipt r JOIN tb_custcom c ON r.custcom_id = c.custcom_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND r.custcom_id = #{custcomId}
AND c.custcom_name LIKE '%' || #{custcomName} || '%'
AND c.psch LIKE '%' || #{psch} || '%'
AND r.trns_dt >= TO_DATE(#{startDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND r.trns_dt <= TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY r.trns_dt DESC
